text: @realDonaldTrump The only good thing that has come from the coronavirus is that in there can’t be many people left stupid enough to not see you for exactly what and who you are… The most despicable human being on the planet and you’re the laughingstock of every person with active brain cells

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
